hibernate-mapping.sql-query: delete from EO_ORDER_MILESTONE T where T.EOOM_ID IN (select EOOM.EOOM_ID from EO_ORDER_MILESTONE EOOM, EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO where EOWO.EOWO_ID in (:eowoIds) and EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO = EOOM.EOOM_WORK_NO and EOWO.EOWO_ORDER_NO = EOOM.EOOM_ORDER_NO and EOWO.ORG_ID = EOOM.ORG_ID)
